title: Trump Administration Begins Immigration Operation in New Orleans - The New York Times
description: Trump Administration Begins Immigration Operation in New OrleansThe New York Times Border Patrol agents detain laborers across New Orleans metro areaWWLTV.com Police in a Louisiana City Welcome a Federal Crackdown. Immigrants Are in Hiding.The New York Times …
content:
It appears that PL/I (and its dialects) is, or will be, the most widely
used higher level language for systems programming.
-- J. Sammet
